coreAttributes.name: snowflake navel piercing
coreAttributes.description: A navel piercing in the shape of a snowflake. It is typically sold pre-enchanted with effects that boost the wearer's arcane cold damage and resistance.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] the snowflake stud into [npc.her] navel piercing.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] the snowflake stud into [npc2.namePos] navel piercing.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(slide)] the snowflake stud into [npc2.namePos] navel piercing.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] [npc.her] snowflake stud out of [npc.her] navel piercing.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] [npc2.namePos] snowflake stud out of [npc2.her] navel piercing.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] snowflake stud out of [npc2.her] navel piercing.
